question: What is the maximum amount that is released on day one from a next day item for a new member?
What items below are listed as no hold items?
choice2: Cashier's checks from other financial institutions.
choice3: Any item issued by Navy Federal & Cash.

question: What are considered non-next day items?
choice1: All other types of checks drawn on other financial institutions and navy federal cashier's checks.
choice2: Checks from other financial institutions and non us-postal money orders
choice3: All other types of checks drawn on other financial institutions and government checks

question: What is the name of the form we give to members when they inquire about our check hold policy?
When any funds are placed on a 5-day hold, you must:
choice1: Select the correct Extended Hold Reason in UAD.
choice2: Select the correct Extended Hold Reason in Encore.
choice3: Select the correct Extended Hold Reason in Webex.

question: Mrs. Tamara J Mckee, an 8-year member presents a check for $1453.88 from Huntington Bank, and asks to deposit it into her checking account. What hold should you put in Encore?
Mr. Ben Gardner, a 5-year member, presents a U.S. Treasury check for $215.00 and a $400.00 business check from Bank of America, asking them to deposit them both. What hold should you put in Encore?

Mr. Jonas Anderson, a member for one year, has presented a check from Fairwinds Credit Union for $15,000, requesting the funds to be deposited into his savings account. What hold should you put in Encore?
The funds availability policy for new members (i.e. members for less than ____ calendar days) is different from the policy for other members.
Ms. Jude Wilson, a member for 10 months, who has no past history of using her Navy Federal account has presented a check for $50,000.71. What holds & steps should you perform in Encore?
choice2: Put 1 Day Float with reason in Encore(“Your account open 30 days or less.”)
choice3: Put 2 Day Float with reason in Encore (“Doubt of Collectibility”)
choice4: Put 5 Day Float with reason in Encore (“Doubt of Collectibility”)

question: Which Bluezone command is supposed to be used when manually applying a 5 day hold for new members under 30 days?
What is a reason why longer check delays may apply?
choice1: A check that was deposited may not be paid
choice2: The member deposited checks totaling more than $5,525 on any one day
choice3: There is an emergency, such as natural disaster or failure of communications equipment

question: Mr. Terrance Walker, a member who joined Navy Federal 25 days ago, presents 6 cashiers' checks from various other banks for $1,200.00 each and a personal check from Wells Fargo for $85.00, requesting that the funds be deposited into his checking account. What float amounts should you enter in Encore?
choice1: No Float: $7285.00, 1 Day Float: $0.00, 2 Day Float: $0.00, 5 Day Float: $0.00
choice2: No Float: $0.00, 1 Day Float: $5,525.00, 2 Day Float: $0.00, 5 Day Float: $1760.00
choice3: No Float: $0.00 1 Day Float: $5555.00, 2 Day Float: $0.00, 5 Day Float: $1760.00

question: If any part of a check deposit is being put toward a loan payment or deposited to a certificate/IRA, that amount will be released...
When the aggregate total of non-next day items is less than $1,000, the funds will be available in how many business days?

When the aggregate total of non-next-day items equals $1,000 or more, the funds will be available after 2 business days, but Encore will release how much at branch processing to be available the next business day?
Member presents a check and has a 'cash no check' alert on her account. Member requests to cash it right away, what steps do you take?
choice1: Put check on a 1 Day Hold
choice2: Cash the check and provide the funds
choice3: Refuse the check and direct them to a manager
choice4: Explain to the member that due to the alert on the account she is not able to negotiate the check
